description: Styles for the Game component in a Tic Tac Toe frontend, defining layout, colors, and button interactions.

classes.name: game
classes.description: The main container for the game, using flexbox for layout.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styling for the game's title, including font size and color.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styling for the display of game's status, including font weight and color.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styling for the reset button, including padding, colors, and hover effects.
